alert.note: Alert for Assumption; East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. James; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 7:02AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ascension, northwestern St. James, southwestern Livingston, southeastern Iberville, south central East Baton Rouge and northern Assumption Parishes through 745 AM CDT... At 702 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Paincourtville, or near Napoleonville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Napoleonville, St. Gabriel, White Castle, Sorrento, French Settlement, Port Vincent, Old Jefferson, Paincourtville, Geismar, Prairieville, Shenandoah, Carville and Belle Rose. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 166 and 191. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; East Baton Rouge; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; St. James; Western Ascension
